sentences.sContent: They developed an acquaintance over the Internet.
You can’t judge her on such short acquaintance (=  when you have not known her long  ) .
sentences.sCn: 认识这么短时间，你无法对她作出评价。

sentences.sContent: My uncle did not improve on further acquaintance (=  when you knew him better  ) .
sentences.sCn: 深交之后我叔叔依然如故。

phrases.pCn: 相识不深的人；不完整或肤浅的知识

words.tran: 熟识的；知晓的；有知识的

trans.tranCn: (对某人的)相识,认识;熟人(with someone)
trans.tranOther: a relationship with someone you know, but who is not a close friend
